title: multithreaded_webscraping
author: Shilpa Hegde
description:
This code will perform web scraping of the html links present in the sitemap .xml file provided using multithreading approach and will create separate folders for each thread. For each thread it will create 2 text files, one with all the html links that have been scraped and the other one with the actual text content of 
those webpages based on the depth specified.Please note that this needs to be downloaded to be run.
